titleStmt.title: The Lambs government to be exalted over all in Israel ..., or, The glory of the Lord risen like devouring fire ... with an exhortation (from God) that none ... seek to physitians ... without his leadings ... / given forth in the movings (at the commandment) of the Captain of Israel, by one that followeth him, William Baily.
titleStmt.author: Bayly, William, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: This work found at reel 1246:12 and 1627:6.
Reproduction of originals in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York, and Harvard University Library.
